16 #define FILDES_STDIO_FLAG 0x0200

19 int unistd_new_open_file(int start);
20 void * unistd_device_open(const char * name, int flags);
21 int unistd_device_ioctl(open_file_t * open_file, int request, void * ctl);
22 int unistd_device_read(open_file_t * open_file, void * buf, int nbyte);
23 int unistd_device_write(open_file_t * open_file, const void * buf, int nbyte);

25 int unistd_init_stdio(int fildes);
26 int unistd_get_open_file(int fildes);

28 void unistd_reset_fildes(int fildes);

30 typedef struct {
31  int err;
32  const sysfs_t * fs;
33  void * handle;
34  int request;
35  void * ctl;
36 } unistd_priv_attr_t;
37 void unistd_priv_ioctl(void * args) MCU_PRIV_EXEC_CODE;
38 
39 
40 static inline void * get_handle(int fildes) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
41 void * get_handle(int fildes){
42  return _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].handle;
43 }
44 
45 static inline void ** get_handle_ptr(int fildes) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
46 void ** get_handle_ptr(int fildes){
47  return &(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].handle);
48 }
49 
50 static inline const sysfs_t * get_fs(int fildes) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
51 const sysfs_t * get_fs(int fildes){
52  return (const sysfs_t*)_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].fs;
53 }
54 
55 static inline int get_flags(int fildes) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
56 int get_flags(int fildes){
57  return _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].flags;
58 }
59 
60 static inline int get_loc(int fildes) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
61 int get_loc(int fildes){
62  return _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].loc;
63 }
64 
65 static inline void * get_open_file(int fildes) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
66 void * get_open_file(int fildes){
67  return (open_file_t*)&(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes]);
68 }
69 
70 static inline void set_loc(int fildes, int loc) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
71 void set_loc(int fildes, int loc){
72  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].loc = loc;
73 }
74 
75 static inline void set_handle(int fildes, void * handle) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
76 void set_handle(int fildes, void * handle){
77  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].handle = handle;
78 }
79 
80 static inline void set_fs(int fildes, const sysfs_t * fs) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
81 void set_fs(int fildes, const sysfs_t * fs){
82  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].fs = (void*)fs;
83 }
84 
85 static inline void set_flags(int fildes, int flags) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
86 void set_flags(int fildes, int flags){
87  _global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[fildes].flags = flags;
88 }
89 
90 static inline void dup_open_file(int new_fd, int old_fd) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
91 void dup_open_file(int new_fd, int old_fd){
92  memcpy( &(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[new_fd]),
93  &(_global_impure_ptr->procmem_base->open_file[old_fd]),
94  sizeof(open_file_t));
95 }
96 
97 static inline void update_loc(int fildes, int loc) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
98 void update_loc(int fildes, int loc){
99  set_loc(fildes, loc);
100 }
101 
102 #endif /* UNISTD_FLAGS_H_ */
